name: Italian Bread Salad with Strawberries and Tomatoes
author: Debra
summary: This is my variation of panzanella. Each ingredient having its own intense flavor, when combined, creates an explosive salad. Perfect for a summer day.
ingredients: 1 loaf Italian bread, cut into 1-inch cubes
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Toss bread cubes with 2 tablespoons olive oil, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and black pepper on a large baking sheet until evenly coated; spread mixture into a single layer
Bake in preheated oven until toasted, about 10 minutes
Transfer toasted bread to a large bowl and mix with strawberries, tomatoes, feta cheese, and onion
Whisk 1/4 cup olive oil, red wine vinegar, and honey in a small bowl; drizzle over bread and tomato salad
